column2: narrow lake within the vast marshland of reeds and pools that formed the Marshes of Nevrast
column3: which were in the eastern lowlands of the country of Nevrast.  The margins of Linaewen abounded with wading birds of every kind. It was from these birds that it took its name: Linaewen is Elvish for "lake of birds".

column1: It has been suggested that Linaewen is a Sindarin name
